titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Summer School of Music and Art Student Records for the Classes of 1945-1990
Yale Summer School of Music and Art Student Records for the Classes of 1945-1990
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:08

did.unittitle: Yale Summer School of Music and Art, student records for the Classes of 1945-1990

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of student records of the Art Division of the Yale Summer School of Music and Art in Norfolk, Connecticut.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Summer School of Music and Art

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 37 (YRG 37), Records of associations, institutes, centers, and organizations affiliated with Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Summer School of Music and Art Student Records for the Classes of 1945-1990 (RU 216). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of student records of the Art Division of the Yale Summer School of Music and Art in Norfolk, Connecticut.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by last name.

controlaccess.subject: Art students
College students

did.unittitle: Student records for the Classes 1945-1990 of the Art Division
